Plot: A story of a man who fakes his own death and assumes a new identity in order to escape his life, who then moves in with a woman who is also trying to leave her past behind.
Title: Arthur Newman
Actors: Colin Firth, Emily Blunt, Lucas Hedges, Anne Heche
tomatoConsensus: Despite the natural charisma of its leads, Arthur Newman does little with its intriguing setup, and the result is bland and unconvincing.
